item.description:
Disco night at the Tewksbury Country Club!

 

2/16/12 PLEASE NOTE this event is now sold out with the Country Club.

 

Yup it's back... no not the 70's, it's disco night at the Country Club, so grab your mini dress, platform healed shoes, or tie-died shirt or not at all but make sure you come down to see everyone else dressed up and dance to the music of the 70's.  What you say you don't dance?  Come on down and hang out and have fun with a great group of people!

What we know so far is the ticket cost is $10.00 but remember to check back as there will be more information as we are notified about it. 

 

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can give your dues to either Donna or Janet at any event.  Thank you!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

 

We look forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Please remember to check back, we will try to reserve a table for us.
item.name: It's a Disco dance party!
